name: The Masters of the Coloured Card Game
name_original: The Masters of the Coloured Card Game
description:
Welcome to Colour Card Game , the most popular Hi-Lo card game in the world established by the World Card (WC) in 2015 . The card game is based to Hi-Lo system with 13 different cards . Your target is guessed the next card if is + or -  than your actual card .

Feature :

2 Modes : Training and Story

Training :  

Train alone for learn the card system and try of beat your best score . 

Story :

A story of 7 episodes who spread on 1 years where you play 4 players card  at the professionals in the World Card (WC) who has been create in 2015 . 

-  +26 Songs  for you accompanies in the different modes 

MINIMUM :

  • Additional Notes: Only Keyboard and Mouse
